Welcome to warpfield3’s documentation!

warpfield3 (Winds And Radiation Pressure: Feedback Induced Expansion, colLapse and Dissolution; Rahner et al. 2017; Rahner et al. 2019) is a python package that allows one to model the evolution and physical structure of the HII region. warpfield3 solves the equations of motion for a 1D spherical shell evolving under the influence of stellar winds, supernova energy injection, radiation pressure, and gravity.

Note

This documentation is still under active development. Stay tuned!
